verses.verse: Shiggaion of David, which he sang unto Jehovah, concerning the words of Cush a Benjamite. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, in thee do I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>: <S%H3467>Save<s%> me from all them that <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H5337>me<s%>, and deliver me,
Lest they <S%H2963>tear<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> like a <S%H738>lion<s%>, Rending it in <S%H6561>pieces<s%>, while there is none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, if I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3426>this<s%>; If there be <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%>;

If I have <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto him that was at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H2502>me<s%>; (Yea, I have delivered him that without <S%H7387>cause<s%> was mine <S%H6887>adversary<s%>;)

Let the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H2416>it<s%>; Yea, let him tread my life <S%H7429>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And <S%H7931>lay<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in thine <S%H639>anger<s%>; Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thyself against the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of mine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%>, And <S%H5782>awake<s%> for <S%H6680>me<s%>; thou hast commanded <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
And let the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> compass thee <S%H5437>about<s%>; And over them <S%H7725>return<s%> thou on <S%H4791>high<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> ministereth <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>: <S%H8199>Judge<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and to mine integrity that is in <S%H8537>me<s%>.

O let the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> come to an <S%H1584>end<s%>, but <S%H3559>establish<s%> thou the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: For the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H974>trieth<s%> the <S%H3629>minds<s%> and <S%H3826>hearts<s%>.
My <S%H4043>shield<s%> is with <S%H430>God<s%>, Who <S%H3467>saveth<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%>, <S%H410>Yea<s%>, a God that hath <S%H2194>indignation<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%>.
If a man <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H3913>not<s%>, he will whet his <S%H2719>sword<s%>; He hath <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and made it <S%H3559>ready<s%>.
He hath also <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for him the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>; He <S%H6466>maketh<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows<s%> fiery <S%H1814>shafts<s%>.
Behold <S%H2254><s%>, he travaileth with <S%H205>iniquity<s%>; <S%H2029>Yea<s%>, he hath conceived <S%H5999>mischief<s%>, and brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.
He hath <S%H3738>made<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%>, and <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H5307>it<s%>, And is fallen into the <S%H7845>ditch<s%> which he <S%H6466>made<s%>.
His <S%H5999>mischief<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>, And his <S%H2555>violence<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> upon his own <S%H6936>pate<s%>.

I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> according to his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And will sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
